Articles.Content:
Can you guys add like a oxygen and foot system to the game where you need to pay to get food and oxygen to the space.

Build like a thing where you storage your food and oxygen so then the game will be more hard

Thanks for reading devs.

UnderSigned:Eletriko100

-------------

Welcome to the forums!

Unfortunately, life support is so frequently requested that we've had to put it on our What Not to Suggest list. It's not that we necessarily think it's a bad idea -- it's just been so frequently brought up in the past that we prefer to keep the discussion table free for people to devote their time and effort to proposing and discussing topics that don't always get as much attention.
